description: Try our easy to follow Balsamic Braised Pork Chops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Balsamic Braised Pork Chops Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the pork to serving plates, stir the sauce, and spoon over the chops. Sprinkle with chopped chives, if desired, and serve with mashed potato and Brussel sprouts.
